dwis is a gwame abwout running rfwom a big wall before you get cwushed

(1/4) during school as i walked to my locker a guy came and started chasing me i ran as fast as i could but he still caught me and shoved me in the janitors closet and left me locked inside till the end of the day. so as me and my friend walked home he showed the bat his dad gave him and as he gave it to me i could almost feel its potential as i heard the loud thump of the bullies footstep coming towards us
